channel.title: [317][Delta]SuperScape[Perfect for beginning coders]
channel.description:
[size=50pt]SuperScape[/size] Made by Super. SuperScape is a very good base for a person trying to make a server. SuperScape has many customs. It is easy to code, and along comes a bunch of tutorials and lists, right in the folder! [code]Customs: Black partyhat Gold partyhat Beautiful cape Danger cape Dragon cape Dragon claws Recolored whips Devil's armour And much more![/code] [code]Commands: ::ipban ::master ::banuser ::jail ::unjail ::copy NAME ::xteleto NAME ::xteletome NAME ::gfx ID ::master ::npcreset ::message MESSAGE ::tele COORDS ::interface ID ::givemod NAME ::giveadmin NAME ::givehidden NAME ::demote NAME ::players ::bootall ::kick NAME ::npc ID ::auto ::changepassword NEWPASSWORD ::pnpc ID ::unpc ::combat LEVEL ::mypos ::hail ::spec ::onpickup ::offpickup ::pickup ::tz ::book ::prayer ::duel ::pure ::rules ::alch ::foods ::resetdrop ::mute ::ipmute ::xpeople ::emote ::bank[/code] Some pictures now. [IMG]http://i959.photobucket.com/albums/ae73/finalspeced/superscape/superscapepic1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i959.photobucket.com/albums/ae73/finalspeced/superscape/superscapepic2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i959.photobucket.com/albums/ae73/finalspeced/superscape/superscapepic3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i959.photobucket.com/albums/ae73/finalspeced/superscape/superscapepic4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i959.photobucket.com/albums/ae73/finalspeced/superscape/superscapepic5.jpg[/img] + Alot more! Start your server with SuperScape now! :)
--Credits-- Delta (This is a delta-based source) Super (Superd00d) (For putting all of this together) I forgot where I got the source from, before I modified it. So credits to whoever that was!
And now for the infamous download link! Client+Source 66.88MB http://www.mediafire.com/?khhrmdlq0w4
If you liked, reply

item.title: [317][Delta]SuperScape[Perfect for beginning coders]
item.dc:creator: @Lewis3 Lewis)
item.description:
@Lewis3 wrote:

I hate the re-coloured items, customes and ugly client (not to mention you changed hardly anything from Delta).
This has no use for new coders it isn’t clean and teaches people to move objects and rename everything to theres.

Plus your breaking the rules

Rep++ if you liked
asking for rep isn’t allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Delta]SuperScape[Perfect for beginning coders]
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Clean base?
I lol’d.

There is no way you can justify the use of tons of custom items, teleports etc as a “clean base”.

item.title: [317][Delta]SuperScape[Perfect for beginning coders]
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

Sigh
When will people learn, nobody wants tons of recolored items.

Anyway, aside from the customs that 99% of the servers have, and 100% of the commands that other servers have, what else does this server have to offer?

Well, except ofcourse everything that ALL OTHER SERVERS HAVE.

Does it have anything unique? What would make me want to download this server over any of the other 100,000 leeches of leeches of leeched leeches?

Read full topic

item.title: [317][Delta]SuperScape[Perfect for beginning coders]
item.dc:creator: @Superd00d Superd00d
item.description:
@Superd00d wrote:

[size=50pt]SuperScape[/size]
Made by Super.
SuperScape is a very good base for a person trying to make a server.
SuperScape has many customs. It is easy to code, and along comes a bunch of tutorials and lists, right in the folder!

Customs: Black partyhat Gold partyhat Beautiful cape Danger cape Dragon cape Dragon claws Recolored whips Devil's armour And much more!

Commands: ::ipban ::master ::banuser ::jail ::unjail ::copy NAME ::xteleto NAME ::xteletome NAME ::gfx ID ::master ::npcreset ::message MESSAGE ::tele COORDS ::interface ID ::givemod NAME ::giveadmin NAME ::givehidden NAME ::demote NAME ::players ::bootall ::kick NAME ::npc ID ::auto ::changepassword NEWPASSWORD ::pnpc ID ::unpc ::combat LEVEL ::mypos ::hail ::spec ::onpickup ::offpickup ::pickup ::tz ::book ::prayer ::duel ::pure ::rules ::alch ::foods ::resetdrop ::mute ::ipmute ::xpeople ::emote ::bank
Some pictures now.




  • Alot more! Start your server with SuperScape now!

–Credits–
Delta (This is a delta-based source)
Super (Superd00d) (For putting all of this together)
I forgot where I got the source from, before I modified it. So credits to whoever that was!
